匴字的基本解释

匴
suǎn
古代行冠礼时装帽子的竹器。
一种厨房内用来漉米或盛东西盘样的竹器；竹器边缘。

匴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suǎn］
［《廣韻》蘇管切，上緩，心。］
(1)古代行冠礼时盛帽子的竹器。
(2)古代淘米或盛饭用的竹器。

匴字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【匚字部】　匴； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页154第27
【唐韻】【集韻】?蘇管切，音算。【廣韻】冠箱也。【儀禮·士冠禮】爵弁，皮弁，緇布冠各一匴。【註】匴，竹器名。今之冠箱也。又【玉篇】?米藪。又【集韻】式撰切，音?。同㔯。義同。一曰竹盤。

匴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
匴字的起名意思

暂无。

Crouch
Basic explanation of words
Crouch
suǎn
Bamboo ware for ancient fashion hats.
A kind of bamboo ware used in the kitchen to scramble rice or to hold things in a dish; the edge of the bamboo ware.
Crouch
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suǎn］
["Guangyun" Su Guanqi, slow up, heart. ]
(1) The bamboo utensils used to wear hats in ancient crown ceremonies.
(2) Ancient bamboo utensils used to wash rice or serve rice.
Crouch
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset 2] [匚字部] 　匴; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 154 27
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Su Guanqie, sound calculation. [Guang Yun] Crown box also. 【Ritual·Science Crown Ceremony】Jue Bian, Pi Bian, and Silk Cloth Crest are each one. [Note] 匴, the name of the bamboo ware. Today's crown box is also. [Jade articles] again? Mi Tau. Also 【Jiyun】style writing and cutting, sound ?. Same as 㔯. The same meaning. One said bamboo plate.

сущ.

2) * короб для головных уборов (из бамбукового лыка)
